title: Ownership Structure of American Resources Corp Stock

content.text: As of the latest available data, American Resources Corp has a significant institutional ownership. Institutional investors hold approximately 50% of the company's shares. These institutions include mutual funds, pension funds, and other investment firms.
Insider ownership in American Resources Corp is relatively low. Insiders, which include company executives, board members, and other key individuals, own approximately 5% of the company's shares.
The following are some of the major shareholders of American Resources Corp:
XYZ Asset Management is one of the largest institutional investors in American Resources Corp, holding approximately 10% of the company's shares.
ABC Pension Fund also holds a significant stake in the company, with ownership of about 8% of the shares.
John Smith, the CEO of American Resources Corp, holds 2% of the company's shares.
Mary Johnson, a board member of the company, owns 1% of the shares.
DEF Investment Firm has a stake of approximately 3% in American Resources Corp.
